item.title: Testing .Rmarkdown
item.description: This is just to test out posting a blog entry as R Markdown since I’ve been mucking about with R to do some data analysis and visualisation. This is just a simple script which basically assigns a variable named test. Here I’m setting it to a simple vector with a couple dummy values test <- c("val1", "val2")
